description: This Dart source file defines the AuthService class which handles user authentication functionalities including login, registration, JWT token storage, retrieval, and logout for a Flutter application. It interacts with a FastAPI backend via HTTP requests and secures tokens using flutter_secure_storage.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A static class that manages user authentication processes including login, registration, secure JWT token storage, and logout.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts user login by sending credentials to the API; stores JWT token upon success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password via API call.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if a valid JWT token is stored, indicating an authenticated user.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes stored JWT token to log out the user.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: _getJwtToken
methods.description: Reads the JWT token from secure storage.
